security: Withholding details on individuals and sources requires careful consideration to prevent revealing intelligence-gathering methods or compromising personal privacy.
summary: This document outlines records checks and actions related to Kleins S. de Mohrenschildt and Jofre Frigaud, including database searches, file reviews, and coordination with various CIA components; Don Moore is scheduled to review DDO material.
summary_one_paragraph: This memorandum details record checks and follow-up actions regarding Kleins S. de Mohrenschildt, involving searches in the Interagency Sasman Register, CI/OA, WUBRINY, LA/Haiti (Vivian Sterlits), and DCD files, in addition to a separate request on Jofre Frigaud. It includes internal notes about accessing DCD material, protecting sources in Haiti, and coordinating with CIA personnel such as Norman Ort, Russ Hines, and Vivian Garinella, and outlines plans for Don Moore to review DDO material related to de Mohrenschildt on a specified date.
title: Memorandum for the Record: Kleins S. de Mohrenschildt
